text: Betty Hall was an early twentieth-century child film actress. She is credited in four silent films. ==Filmography== * A Lass o' the Looms (1919) as Girl * The Black Spider (1920) as Irene Carfour * The Sting of the Lash (1921) as Crissy (6 years) * The First Woman (1922) as Marie ==See also== * ==References== ==External links== * Category:English silent film actresses Category:1910s births Category:Year of death missing Category:Date of death missing
title: Betty Hall
